replies.body: I'd like to help you out, but need some more specifics about what you're experiencing here.  When you get disconnected, when is that happening exactly?  Is it in game, in the client, or the patcher?  Specific details about what you're seeing and when can help a lot!
when i join game the loading screen still at 0% and after that i had this result " you have disconnected please check your internet and try again "and when i re connect it happened to me again

It sounds like your network is having trouble connecting to your individual game server.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, which will provide a list of steps to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have issues afterwards!
